DOC.brief_summary: A 2-year, Multicenter, Open-label, Phase IIIb Extension Study to Assess Bone Mineral Density and Bone Turnover Response to 5 mg Daily Risedronate Treatment in Women with Postmenopausal Osteoporosis Who Sequentially Completed Clinical Studies RVE009093, RVE1996077, RVE1998080, and RVE2001079 (NCT01249261)
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess BMD and Bone Turnover Response to 5 mg Daily Risedronate Treatment in Women With PMO
DOC.detailed_description: A 2-year, Multicenter, Open-label, Phase IIIb Extension Study to Assess Bone Mineral Density and Bone Turnover Response to 5 mg Daily Risedronate Treatment in Women with Postmenopausal Osteoporosis Who Sequentially Completed Clinical Studies RVE009093, RVE1996077, RVE1998080, and RVE2001079 (NCT01249261)
DOC.criteria: have satisfactorily completed Clinical Study RVE2001079 (Year 8 extension study) Can not use any bone modifying substances except risedronate
